prod_short_desc: Imagine and create with this big box of colorful bricks!
prod_long_desc:
Open up a world of creativity with this huge selection of colorful LEGO® DUPLO® bricks. With fun accessories such as opening windows, your young builder can soon make their own DUPLO city or any other creation that captures their imagination. There's also a child DUPLO figure and a cat figure included to inspire endless role-play fun. DUPLO bricks are specially designed to be fun and safe for little hands.
Includes a child LEGO® DUPLO® figure, plus a cat figure.
Features 120 colorful LEGO® DUPLO® pieces, including opening windows and doors.
Accessory elements include a suitcase, propeller and flowers, plus bricks decorated as a gift and flowers as story starters.
Encourage creativity with this versatile set.
Help your child build and play with their own LEGO® DUPLO® city.
Build a house, a tree, a boat or a rocket—the options are endless!
Practice role-play skills and create stories with the child DUPLO figure and cat figure.
LEGO® DUPLO® products are specially designed to be fun and easy for little hands.
This set offers an age-appropriate build and play experience for ages 2-5 years.
